text:
@realDonaldTrump Hey Donald, people are dying, the largest coronavirus cases have hit record highs and thousands of jobs are lost...instead of you and the GOP coming up with a plan to keep us alive, instead you are taking golf! The sad case of @realDonaldTrump 

Come Nov I’m voting Biden! ✋🏾✋🏻
